description:
I had not heard from Chris in about two years. He was always very shy and I was surprised that he had gotten as far as he had with Mitch and Greg. So I was very, very surprised when, out of the blue, I received an email from him. He had been very busy but things had finally lightened up and he was ready to go. Of course, I said yes!
When he finally arrived, he was cute as ever, but he had put on more muscle. His arms were a lot bigger and his biceps were stretching out the fabric of his shirt. I wanted him to show off what he had been doing in the gym. So, he and Jarek had a workout session to get the sweat going. They both obviously know what they were doing but it was just a lot more exciting to watch them do it naked — their balls hanging in each others’ faces and bouncing up and down as they completed a set of pyramid-style pushups.
But, what started as a playful lesson on exercise and technique quickly turned into quite a competition. I loved all the macho posturing. It felt like it was going to fuel their fucking with some intense testosterone!
Chris got his ass eaten and hole teased and then Jarek went in with his big dick. There was ass pounding, with lots grabbing and growling. Chris pushed back against Jarek’s cock hard — he wanted it deeper!
title: Chris & Jarek
